plot: Sequel to famous Indonesian TV series around a girl group. This time the group members travel to Seoul to perform at a large K-pop concert. Romantic comedy in Seoul in winter.
plot_en: Sequel to famous Indonesian TV series around a girl group. This time the group members travel to Seoul to perform at a large K-pop concert. Romantic comedy in Seoul in winter.

title: Putih Abu Abu 2
